title: Expert Consensus-Based Framework Simulation Training Program for Enhancing Narrative Medicine Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic professional knowledge in medical/legal/technical fields, patient-centered communication experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a VR simulation environment using personal devices, focusing on developing narrative medical competencies through expert consensus framework validation. Includes educational materials based on real-world medical scenarios and multicultural contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 'Attending' skill of listening to patients' narratives in clinical settings and documenting key elements with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively express empathetic responses at least three times when interacting with patients from diverse cultural backgrounds through VR simulation.
Learners can reconstruct their clinical narratives based on peer feedback and write improved statements demonstrating at least 20% enhancement in professionalism.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
